source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_all_additional_appeal

AS

SELECT 
    ST1.appealrefnumber,
    ST1.lastmodified,
    ST1.decisiondate,
    ST1.decisionsubmitdate,
    ST1.bespokeindicator,
    ST1.bespoketargetdate,
    ST1.processingstate,
    ST1.linkstatus,
    ST1.casecloseddate,
    ST1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,
    ST1.numberofresidences,
    ST1.appealsdocumentscomplete,
    ST1.questionnairereceived,
    ST1.lpaconditionsreceived,
    ST1.lpaconditionsforwarded,
    ST1.statementsdue,
    ST1.lpastatementsubmitted,
    ST1.lpastatementforwarded,
    ST1.appellantstatementsubmitted,
    ST1.appellantstatementforwarded,
    ST1.finalcommentsdue,
    ST1.lpacommentssubmitted,
    ST1.lpacommentsforwarded,
    ST1.statementofcommongrounddue,
    ST1.statementofcommongroundreceived,
    ST1.appellantcommentssubmitted,
    ST1.appellantcommentsforwarded,
    ST1.thirdpartyrepsdue,
    ST1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,
    ST1.sitenoticesent,
    ST1.proofsdue,
    ST1.lpaproofssubmitted,
    ST1.lpaproofsforwarded,
    ST1.appellantsproofssubmitted,
    ST1.appellantsproofsforwarded,
    ST1.areaofsiteinhectares,
    ST1.dateofdecisionifissued,
    ST1.typeofapplication,
    ST1.appealsourceindicator,
    ST1.developmentorallegation,
    ST1.amountdue,
    ST1.sitegreenbelt,
    ST1.lpaapplicationreference,
    ST1.lpaapplicationdate,
    ST1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,
    ST1.daterecovered,
    ST1.callindate,
    ST2.caseprocess,
    ST2.caseworkmarker,
    ST2.costsappliedforindicator,
    ST2.level,
    ST2.procedureappellant,
    ST2.procedurelpa,
    ST2.proceduredetermineddate,
    ST2.targetdate,
    ST2.agriculturalholding,
    ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,
    ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres,
    ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting,
    ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing,
    ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade,
    ST2.incarelatestoca,
    ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite,
    ST2.isfloodinganissue,
    ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb,
    ST2.sitewithinsssi
    FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_additional_data ST1 
    FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_add_additional_data ST2 on ST1.appealrefnumber = ST2.appealrefnumber
    GROUP BY ST1.appealrefnumber,lastmodified,decisiondate,decisionsubmitdate,bespokeindicator,bespoketargetdate,processingstate,linkstatus,casecloseddate,pcsappealwithdrawndate,
numberofresidences,appealsdocumentscomplete,questionnairereceived,lpaconditionsreceived,lpaconditionsforwarded,statementsdue,lpastatementsubmitted,lpastatementforwarded,
appellantstatementsubmitted,appellantstatementforwarded,finalcommentsdue,lpacommentssubmitted,lpacommentsforwarded,statementofcommongrounddue,statementofcommongroundreceived,
appellantcommentssubmitted,appellantcommentsforwarded,thirdpartyrepsdue,thirdpartyrepsforwarded,sitenoticesent,proofsdue,lpaproofssubmitted,lpaproofsforwarded,
appellantsproofssubmitted,appellantsproofsforwarded,areaofsiteinhectares,dateofdecisionifissued,typeofapplication,appealsourceindicator,developmentorallegation,
amountdue,sitegreenbelt,lpaapplicationreference,lpaapplicationdate,datenotrecoveredorderecovered,daterecovered,callindate,caseprocess,caseworkmarker,
costsappliedforindicator,level,procedureappellant,procedurelpa,proceduredetermineddate,targetdate,agriculturalholding,developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,
floorspaceinsquaremetres,sitegridreferenceeasting,sitegridreferencenorthing,historicbuildinggrantmade,incarelatestoca,inspectorneedtoentersite,isfloodinganissue,isthesitewithinanaonb,sitewithinsssi;

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_hedgerow

AS

SELECT 
    ref_year,
    identifier,
    full_ref,
    horizn_ref,
    processing_state,
    lpa,
    receipt_date,
    name_of_appellant,
    agent,
    site_address,
    postcode,
    corr,
    case_officer,
    appeal_type,
    withdrawn_or_rejected,
    date_wd_or_r,
    acknow_date,
    valid_date,
    start_date,
    2_week_date,
    6_week_date,
    9_week_date,
    questionnaire_received,
    inspector,
    procedure,
    event_date,
    date_sent_to_inspector,
    date_rec_from_insp,
    decision,
    reader_sent_to,
    date_decision_issued,
    target_date,
    notes,
    put_away,
    pa_barcode,
    ready_for_event,
    receipt_to_start_average,
    start_to_event_average,
    event_to_decision_average,
    receipt_to_decision_average,
    handle_time_in_weeks,
    decision_month,
    open_or_closed,
    old_case_off_not_to_be_used
    FROM odw_standardised_db.casework_specialist_hedgerow
    GROUP BY ref_year,
    identifier,
    full_ref,
    horizn_ref,
    processing_state,
    lpa,
    receipt_date,
    name_of_appellant,
    agent,
    site_address,
    postcode,
    corr,
    case_officer,
    appeal_type,
    withdrawn_or_rejected,
    date_wd_or_r,
    acknow_date,
    valid_date,
    start_date,
    2_week_date,
    6_week_date,
    9_week_date,
    questionnaire_received,
    inspector,
    procedure,
    event_date,
    date_sent_to_inspector,
    date_rec_from_insp,
    decision,
    reader_sent_to,
    date_decision_issued,
    target_date,
    notes,
    put_away,
    pa_barcode,
    ready_for_event,
    receipt_to_start_average,
    start_to_event_average,
    event_to_decision_average,
    receipt_to_decision_average,
    handle_time_in_weeks,
    decision_month,
    open_or_closed,
    old_case_off_not_to_be_used
